snippet: The N.F.L.’s competition committee has recommended making it permanent to snap extra-point kicks from the 15-yard line.
abstract: NFL proposes series of rule changes ahead of upcoming owner's meeting; other pro football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s competition committee has recommended making it permanent to snap extra-point kicks from the 15-yard line.

headline.main: N.F.L. Owners to Weigh Rule Changes
